data.name: 夏恋幻梦~动态壁纸+CG大图
data.detailed_description:
《夏恋幻梦》的动态壁纸和CG大图合集
包含39张CG大图和5张动态壁纸
data.about_the_game:
《夏恋幻梦》的动态壁纸和CG大图合集
包含39张CG大图和5张动态壁纸
data.short_description: 《夏恋幻梦》的动态壁纸和CG大图合集 包含39张CG大图和5张动态壁纸

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win7 64Bit/Win8 Win8.1 64Bit/Win10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel G620 or AMD X2 280 /AMD(APU) A6 9500
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX750 /AMD GPU Radeon HD 6850
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7 64Bit/Win8 Win8.1 64Bit/Win10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 6500 / AMD CPU FX8350
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970/1060 /AMD GPU RadeonR9 290

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content、mild sexual innuendo
